sign-in_desc: Our mission is to help people to find a person for co-parenting
forgot-pass_success: Password has been sent to your email
sign-up_step1-alert: Welcome to nesting! Sign up now. It will only take a minute and will enable you to have a quick look at the other users
sign-up_warning: This app is designated for finding a partner for Co-parenting by choice. A model that allows aspiring parents to team up for the purpose of raising children in separate households, free from romantic involvement. Any other use might result in suspension.
sign-up_email-confirm: Confirmation message has been sent to your email address
sign-up_email-success: Thank you! Your registration is approved
sign-up_email-error: Error occurred while sending email confirmation
sign-up2_suggestion: Would you like to complete your profile now?
sign-up2_suggestion-no: No, I will complete it later
sign-up2_images-label: You can upload up to 4 photos
sign-up2_privacy: I accept the Privacy policy of Nesting
account_add-photo-more: Add up to 4 photos to your profile
upgrade_text: Upgrade your membership to get more features
like-match_text: You can write a message to the person or continue looking
dashboard_viewers: Who viewed my profile (but didn’t like)
home_no-items-title: Oops... We did not find anyone near you
home_no-items-text: Hi! There are still no people near you. But you can change your area in the filters
field-gender_hint: What gender identity do you prefer to be presented as?
field-orientation_hint: We have collectively noted the tendencies that we found to be highly relevant in the context of co-parenting. We would be pleased to hear if you believe that we have overlooked anything important. We invite you to write to us using the aforementioned link.
field-privacy: This information will not be shown to other users
